content: Something totry: - in privacy&setting, click 'saved passwords' and then 'show passwords', and then highlight the two rows for the account and delete both of them. That removes all password info for the account so you can then try again.
creator: davidsk

content: To use Exchange, you need to use one of two addons (OWL or EXQUILLA) or the freeware, DAVMAIL.
creator: davidsk
